get.description: Return a list of [couriers activated at your AfterShip account](https://admin.aftership.com/settings/couriers).

post.description: Return a list of matched couriers based on tracking number format and [selected couriers](https://admin.aftership.com/settings/couriers) or a list of couriers.

get.description: Return a list of all couriers.
Get tracking results of multiple trackings.

tracking.title: Title Name
tracking.pickup_note: Reach out to our staffs when you arrive our stores for shipment pickup

get.description: Get tracking results of a single tracking.

post.description: Retrack an expired tracking. Max 3 times per tracking.
Mark a tracking as completed. The tracking won't auto update until retrack it.

get.description: Get contact information for the users to notify when the tracking changes. Please note that only customer receivers will be returned. Any `email`, `sms` or `webhook` that belongs to the Store will not be returned.

post.description: Add notification receivers to a tracking number.
Remove notification receivers from a tracking number.

get.description: Return the tracking information of the last checkpoint of a single tracking.
